analysis.description:
MythereumCardToken (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#245-290) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#251)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#259-262)

Reentrancy in Mythereum.upgradeCardDamage (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#380-391):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(mythexContract.burn(msg.sender,costOfUpgrade)) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#388-389)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cardDamageUpgradeLevel (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#389)

Reentrancy in Mythereum.upgradeCardShield (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#391-409):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(mythexContract.burn(msg.sender,costOfUpgrade)) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#401-406)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- cardShieldUpgradeLevel (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#406-407)

Mythereum._processERC20TokenPackPurchase (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#440-456) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transferFrom(_buyer,address(this),costPerPack) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#448-451)

Mythereum.burnMythexTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#456-461) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MythereumERC20Token(mythexTokenAddress).burn(_burner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#459-461)

Mythereum.burnXPTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#461-468) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MythereumERC20Token(xpTokenAddress).burn(_burner,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#464-468)

Mythereum.grantMythexTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#468-477) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MythereumERC20Token(mythexTokenAddress).mint(_recipient,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#474-476)

Mythereum.grantXPTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#477-482) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MythereumERC20Token(xpTokenAddress).mint(_recipient,_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol#481-482)

Mythereum._deliverPack (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cardToken.mintRandomCards(recipient,editionNumber,edition.packSize) (/unique_chucks/17/0x8167e5effc9eb82b5d1b5e384eebc2f01c45d749.sol)
